Property.name: code
Property.Description: document name ( with extension ) for example: package.class.CLS

Method.name: codeSet
Method.Implementation: s i%code = code s i%name = ..nameExtract( code ) s i%ext = ..extExtract( code ) Q 1

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Description: This callback method is invoked by the <METHOD>%New</METHOD> method to provide notification that a new instance of an object is being created.
Method.Implementation: s ..code = code, ..event = event, ..printer = printer Quit $$$OK

Method.name: on
Method.Description: Read settings and run event handlers

Method.name: handle
Method.Implementation:
d ..printer.trace( ..event_"( "_..code _ " )" )
Q:..ignore() 1
s filename = ..filename()
if ..event = "afterdelete" { s sc = ..fileDelete( filename ) d ..printer.w( "Delete " _ filename, sc ) Q sc }
#; change events - beforeload, aftersave, aftercompile s tsFile = ..tsFile( filename ), tsCode = ..tsCode() ;ts - timeStamp
d ..printer.trace( "tsFile: " _ tsFile _" ( " _ filename _ " ) " ) d ..printer.trace( "tsCode: " _ tsCode )
if ( tsCode = tsFile ) { Q 1 ;nothing to sync }
#define ok(%sc) $S( +%sc = 1: "Ok!", 1: "Fail ;(" )
if ( tsCode ] tsFile ) { ;export
s sc = ..export( filename ) d ..printer.w( ..code _" -> " _ filename _" " _ $$$ok(sc) ) Q sc }
if (( tsFile ] tsCode ) && ( ..event '= "aftercompile" )) { ;import
s sc = ..import( filename ) ; file newer - import from file d ..printer.w( filename _" -> " _ ..code _" " _ $$$ok(sc) ) Q sc
}
Q $$$OK

Method.name: workdir
Method.Implementation: Q ##class(sc.options).workdir()

Method.name: fileDelete
Method.Implementation: set sc = ##class(%File).Delete( file ) Quit sc

Method.name: filename
Method.Description: convert code name to file name, packages translate as directories
Method.Implementation:
s name = ..name s namelen = $l( name, "." ) s hasPackage = ( namelen > 1 ) s ext = ..ext
s dir = ..workdir(), path = ""
if ( hasPackage ) { ;myPackage.myClass.CLS or test.MAC
s packages = $p( name, ".", 1, namelen - 1 ) s dm = "\" ; $$$IsWINDOWS s path = $tr( packages, ".", dm )
s:packages'="" dir = dir _ dm _ path
s name = $p( name, ".", namelen )
}
s sc = ##class(%File).CreateDirectoryChain( dir ) ;need for (%File).NormalizeFilename s file = name _ "."_ ext _ ".xml" Q ##class(%File).NormalizeFilename( file, dir )

Method.name: filemask
Method.Implementation: Q "*.CLS.xml"

Method.name: ignore
Method.Implementation: Q:$e(..code)="%" 1 ;ignore system classes Q:##class(%RoutineMgr).IsGenerated( ..code ) 1 ;ignore generated classes (from csp.page) Q:##class(%RoutineMgr).IsClassGenerated( ..name ) 1 ;ignore generated classes (from csp.page) Q:$p(..code,".")="INFORMATION" 1 ;ignore SQL-STANDART classes Q 0

Method.name: export
Method.Implementation: s sc = $system.OBJ.Export( ..code, filename, "-d/diffexport" ) Q sc

Method.name: import
Method.Implementation: s sc = $system.OBJ.Load( filename, flags, .err, .list ) s:sc ..code = list Q sc

Method.name: tsFile
Method.Implementation: Quit:'##class(%File).Exists( file ) "" Quit $zdatetime( ##class(%File).GetFileDateModified( file ), 3 )

Method.name: tsCode
Method.Implementation: s cls = ..name s sql = "Select TimeChanged From %Dictionary.ClassDefinition Where ID = ? " s rs = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect( , sql, cls) s tsh = "" s:rs.%Next() tsh = rs.%GetData(1) s ts = $zdt( tsh, 3) Q ts

Method.name: extExtract
Method.Implementation: Q $p( code, ".", $l( code, "." ) )

Method.name: exportAll
importAll
Method.Implementation: s mask = ..filemask(), workdir = ##class(sc.options).workdir() s printer = ##class(sc.printer).new() s sc = ..importDir( workdir, mask, printer, .loaded ) Q $system.OBJ.CompileList( .loaded, "ckbr-d/multicompile" )

Method.name: importDir
Method.Implementation:
s subdir = "", sc = 1
s rs = ##class(%File).FileSetFunc( dir, mask, , 1 )
while rs.%Next() {
if ( rs.Type = "D" ){ s subdir( $i( subdir ) ) = rs.Name continue }
s handler = ..%New( "", "importAll", printer ) s sc = handler.import( rs.Name, "k-d" ) ;"k-d" - load only d printer.w( rs.Name _ " -> " _ handler.code , sc )
if ( 'sc ) Quit
s loaded( handler.code )="" ;save name of loaded document
}
Q:'sc sc
s i = "" for { s i = $o( subdir(i), 1, sub ) Q:i="" s sc = ..importDir( sub, mask, printer, .loaded ) Q:'sc } Q:'sc sc
Q sc

Method.name: codeSet
Method.Implementation: s sc = ##super(code) s sc = sc && ..getData( code, .data ) if ( sc ) { s i%id = $g(data("id")) s i%fullName = $g(data("fullName")) } Q 1

Method.name: getData
Method.Implementation: s sql = "Select ID, fullName From %DeepSee_UserLibrary.FolderItem Where documentName = ?" s rs = ##class(%SQL.Statement).%ExecDirect( , sql, code ) s ( id, fullName ) = "" if ( rs.%Next() ) { s data("id") = rs.ID s data("fullName") = rs.fullName } Q 1

Method.name: tsCode
Method.Description: return local timestamp of DFI document
Method.Implementation: s utcTS = ##class(%DeepSee.UserLibrary.FolderItem).timeModifiedGetStored( ..id ) ;UTC timestamp s utc = $zdth(utcTS,3,,3) ;utc logical s local = $zdth(utc,-3) ; utc to local s ts = $zdt(local,3,,0) ; local timestamp Q ts

Method.name: import
export
Method.Implementation: Q ##class(%DeepSee.UserLibrary.Utils).%Export( ..fullName, filename, 0 )

Method.name: filename
Method.Description: convert code name to file name, packages translate as directories DFI example: BI-TechnologyTopicAnalyticsViews.pivot.DFI where 'pivot.DFI' - type and extensions TechnologyTopicAnalyticsViews - name of DFI BI - virtual folder
Method.Implementation:
s name = ..name s namelen = $l( name, "." ) s hasPackage = ( namelen > 2 ) ;2 - name and type s ext = ..ext
s dir = ..workdir(), path = ""
if ( hasPackage ) { ;has virtual folder
s packages = $p( name, ".", 1, namelen - 2 ) ;2 - name and type s dm = "\" ; $$$IsWINDOWS s path = $tr( packages, ".", dm ) ; NOTE - need filename checking!
if ( packages'="" ) { s dir = dir _ dm _ path }
s name = $p( name, ".", namelen-1, namelen )
}
s sc = ##class(%File).CreateDirectoryChain( dir ) ;need for (%File).NormalizeFilename s file = name _ "."_ ext _ ".xml"
Q ##class(%File).NormalizeFilename( file, dir )

Method.name: filemask
Method.Implementation: Q "*.DFI.xml"

Method.name: exportAll
ignore
Method.Implementation: Q 0

Method.name: storage
Method.Implementation: Q "^sc"

Method.name: get
Method.Implementation: s storage = ..storage(), key = $g(key) Q:key="" $g(@storage, default) Q $g(@storage@(key), default)

Method.name: set
Method.Description: save settings - return settings value after save

Method.name: workdir
Method.Description: set or get working directory by default - current namespace database directory

Method.name: handlers
Method.Description: get or set handlers for event <var>handlers</var> - comma-separated value, for example: ("aftercompile") = "sc.handler,test.sctestrunner"
Method.Implementation:
Q:'$d(ext) ""
s storage = ..storage(), key = "ext"
s:$d( handlers ) @storage@( key, ext ) = handlers ;set mode
s handlers = $g( @storage@( key, ext ) ) ;get mode
Q handlers

Method.name: printer
Method.Description: get or set classname for printer
Method.Implementation: s storage = ..storage(), key = "printer" s:$d(printer) @storage@(key) = printer Q $g(@storage@(key))

Method.name: init
Method.Implementation: d ..workdir( ..workdir() ) d ..handlers( "CLS", "sc.classes" ) d ..handlers( "MAC", "sc.routines" ) d ..handlers( "INT", "sc.routines" ) d ..handlers( "INC", "sc.routines" ) d ..handlers( "DFI", "sc.dfi" ) d ..printer( "sc.printer" ) Q 1

Method.name: dump
Method.Implementation: s storage = ..storage() zw @storage

Class.name: sc.plugin
Class.Description: [s]ource [c]ontrol plugin for InterSystems CachÃ© (testing in v.2016.1) Just export or import to/from filesystem. Nothing more.

Parameter.name: Flags
Parameter.Description:
Just sync.
  • 1 : Present dialog on check in
  • 2 : Present dialog on check out
  • 3 : Ask to add new item to source control
  • 4 : Ask to remove deleted item from source control

Property.name: Modified
Property.Description:
Workaround for error in %Studio.AbstractDocument:SaveStream()+16 in Cache for Windows (x86-64) 2016.1 (Build 596U) Mon Nov 9 2015 21:12:55 EST
If the root node is set to 1 then calls to the source control hooks will keep track if the source control hook modifies the document and if it does then it will defined %SourceControl.Modified(docname)=1.

Method.name: OnBeforeLoad
Method.Description: Import the file from the external format into Cache. This is called before the actual load of data to give the chance to load the item from an external format.
Method.Implementation: s ..Modified = 0 ;workaround for error in %Studio.AbstractDocument:SaveStream()+16 Q ..on( "beforeload", code )

Method.name: OnAfterSave
Method.Implementation: Q ..on( "aftersave" , code )

Method.name: OnAfterCompile
Method.Description: Called when Studio compile code and some parts of code may be changed for example - storage scheme
Method.Implementation: Q ..on( "aftercompile", code ) ;only for additional export

Method.name: OnAfterDelete
Method.Implementation: Q ..on( "afterdelete", code )

Method.name: on
Method.Implementation: Q ##class(sc.classes).on( event, code )

Method.name: install
Method.Implementation:
#; v.2015 #; s sc = ##class(%Studio.SourceControl.Interface).SourceControlClassSet( $classname(), ns )
#; workaround for 2012.2 s ^%SYS("SourceControlClass",ns) = $classname()
d ##class(sc.options).handlers( "CLS", "sc.classes" ) d ##class(sc.options).handlers( "MAC", "sc.routines" ) d ##class(sc.options).handlers( "INT", "sc.routines" ) d ##class(sc.options).handlers( "INC", "sc.routines" ) d ##class(sc.options).handlers( "DFI", "sc.dfi" ) d ##class(sc.options).printer( "sc.printer" ) Q 1

Method.name: uninstall
Method.Implementation:
#; v.2015 #; s sc = ##class(%Studio.SourceControl.Interface).SourceControlClassSet( "", ns )
#; workaround for 2012.2 s ^%SYS("SourceControlClass",ns) = "" Q 1

Method.name: %OnNew
Method.Description: test This callback method is invoked by the <METHOD>%New</METHOD> method to provide notification that a new instance of an object is being created.
Method.Implementation: s ..device = device Q 1

Method.name: new
w
Method.Implementation: s io = $io use ..device w !,"** ", msg w:sc'="" " ", $S(+sc=1: "Ok!", 1:"FAIL") use io

Method.name: error
Method.Implementation: d ..w(msg)

Method.name: filemask
Method.Implementation: Q "*.MAC.xml;*.INT.xml;*.INC.xml"

Method.name: exportAll
tsCode
Method.Implementation: s ts = ##class(%RoutineMgr).TS( ..code ) Q $p( ts, "." ) ;remove milliseconds

Method.name: ignore
Method.Implementation: Q:$e(..code)="%" 1 ;ignore system routines Q:##class(%RoutineMgr).IsGenerated( ..code ) 1 ;ignore generated routines Q 0
